habitat.terrain: Dense, ancient forests with towering trees

distinctive_features: Horns on the head resembling twisted branches

behavior.patterns: Nocturnal, often seen during full moons
behavior.social_structure: Solitary, with occasional gatherings during mating season

lore.origin_story: Born from the union of the earth and the sky, the Aetherwyrm was created to maintain balance in Eldergrove.

legends.title: The Moonlit Dance
legends.summary: A tale of an Aetherwyrm that danced under the full moon, bringing prosperity to the land.
